MyFinance.Add_Fund_Warning: *Please be aware tht that bank fees occur wehnever you are transfering money from your account to the platform. We will be taking over one tranzaction fee a calendar year but all other fees would need to be covered by the user. We therefore recommend that you park a higher amount than a consultation fee on your account that you can use at your own discretion. All money parked in your wallet you can remove back to your account at any time you decide to do so.
